attributes.additional_details: The fireworks intent what they used to be like when I was younger they are like bombs going of there all fake ones that terrify the Animals.Its not fair that everyone’s animals and owners have to suffer a full week of absolute carnage.i have dogs at home i sat with my tv on full blast and a hairdryer on cold for the noise and cold heat cause my little dog was shaking that much she was soaked with sweating.Please will you imagine the stress that we and the animals are going through it’s Cruelty
attributes.background: Peoples animals are getting injured,stressed and killed.i am an animal owner myself and i have a 20 year old Horse which has Arthritis and had an injury a year ago the fireworks went off for a week and she can hardly walk.Vet Bills Are an Absolute fortune and people can’t afford to pay them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Ban both private and public use of fireworks & replace with cleaner alternatives" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750214
